content: the nazari crochet top for women is size s 36-38 and its final measurements once all the pieces are joined together are 45 cm wide and 42 cm long from the shoulder to the hem the size s needs 3 skeins of katia fair cotton 50 gr=155 m granny square measurements 16 x 16 cm once blocked size can be graded up by adding row to the granny square and adding lenght to the straps altought no instructions come for that
